page.title: 15CHURCHES AND CHAPELS
page.content:
{Hetton Independent Methodist Church was founded in 1884. The age group of members ranges from 10 yrs to 87 yrs. There are usually{40 members}in the congregation. It originated when the Methodists could not afford to pay for a minister, so they started a free democratic type of worship. At first, they started worshipping in houses, but as time progressed they built {churches.
{E. Rainton Chapel}was built in 1823 but it was in such bad condition it had to be rebuilt in 1889. E. Rainton {Chapel}is only very small but although it is quite a disadvantage there are still a lot of{activities}being held. Every Sunday morning at 10.45{Sunday {School}is held. It is open to all ages up to 15 then you can help teach the little ones.
